import React from "react"; import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionItemHeading, AccordionItemButton, AccordionItemPanel, } from "react-accessible-accordion"; import "src/modules/Forecast/forecast.css"; const WEEK_DAYS = [ "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", "Sunday", ]; const Forecast = ({ data }) => { const dayInAWeek = new Date().getDay(); const forecastDays = WEEK_DAYS.slice(dayInAWeek, WEEK_DAYS.length).concat( WEEK_DAYS.slice(0, dayInAWeek) ); return ( <> {data.list.splice(0, 7).map((item, idx) => (
))} ); }; export default Forecast;
